question.body: Which of the following is not on the organ level of organization of the integumentary system?

response.feedback: Incorrect. The epidermis contains more than one type of tissue, which places it on the organ level.
Correct. Epithelial is a type of tissue and not an organ.
Incorrect. A nail contains more than one type of tissue, which places it on the organ level.
Incorrect. Glands contain more than one tissue, which places them on the organ level.
